snippet.title: Indian Cosmological Ideas
snippet.description: Indian Cosmological Ideas / Narayan, R This paper, third in the series on Indian tradition of physics, describes conceptions of the cosmos with ideas that are clearly spelt out in texts such as Yoga Vasishtha.In particular, the conception of multiple universes that occurs often in this text will be examined in the framework of the Indian physics. [...] arXiv:0705.1192. \- 2007\. - 12 p. Full text
